00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 #include <unistd.h>
00031 #include <math.h>
00032 
00033 #include "freenect_internal.h"
00034 #define GRAVITY 9.80665
00035 
00036 int freenect_get_raw_accelerometers(freenect_device *dev, int16_t* x, int16_t* y, int16_t* z)
00037 {
00038         unsigned char buf[10];
00039         uint16_t ux, uy, uz;
00040         int ret = fnusb_control(&dev->usb_motor, 0xC0, 0x32, 0x0, 0x0, buf, 10);
00041         if (ret != 10)
00042                 printf("Error in accelerometer reading, libusb_control_transfer returned %d\n", ret);
00043         
00044         ux = ((uint16_t)buf[2] << 8) | buf[3];
00045         uy = ((uint16_t)buf[4] << 8) | buf[5];
00046         uz = ((uint16_t)buf[6] << 8) | buf[7];
00047         *x = (int16_t)ux;
00048         *y = (int16_t)uy;
00049         *z = (int16_t)uz;
00050         
00051         return ret;
00052 }
00053 
00054 int freenect_get_mks_accelerometers(freenect_device *dev, double* x, double* y, double* z)
00055 {
00056         //the documentation for the accelerometer (http://www.kionix.com/Product%20Sheets/KXSD9%20Product%20Brief.pdf) 
00057         //states there are 819 counts/g  
00058         int16_t ix, iy, iz;
00059         int ret = freenect_get_raw_accelerometers(dev,&ix,&iy,&iz);
00060 
00061         *x = (double)ix/FREENECT_COUNTS_PER_G*GRAVITY;
00062         *y = (double)iy/FREENECT_COUNTS_PER_G*GRAVITY;
00063         *z = (double)iz/FREENECT_COUNTS_PER_G*GRAVITY;
00064 
00065         return ret;
00066 }
